name: Mohammed Alawami
objective: An Electical and Computer Engineering graduate, intrested in Embedded Programming, Software Development, Web Development, and Data Science
aboutMe: I graduated from Oregon State University on June '19, with an Electical and Computer Engineering degree, and a minor in Computer Science. I have a passion for learning the art of coding and programming, currently I'm taking intrest in Data Science, and learing how to analyze, and make use of big data collections.

experince.summary: Worked with a team of developers to develop and implementing integration tests in Python for Express and Groovey API
duties: Debugged and reporting bugs in API's and dev portal.

education.major: Bachelor of Science, Electrical and Computer Engineering.
meta: Related coursework: C/C++ programming, Operating Systems, Software verification and validation, Computer Architecture, Data Structures, Web Development, Microcontrollers, System Verilog.

projects.name: Automated Greenhouse
projects.description: Designed a system that monitor the environment inside a greenhouse, and automate the process of growing plants in a safe environment. The system includes soil moister sensors and a temperature sensor connected to Wi-Fi modules to communicate with the hub, an irrigation system, an exhaust fan. Built website to view

projects.name: Alarm Clock with FM Radio using Atmega128
projects.description: Designed and built a stereo FM alarm clock radio with inside/ outside temperature indications using two AVR microcontrollers, ATMEGA 128 and ATMEGA 48. Included features, volume control, clock control, brightness auto control, and used 7-sigment display and an LCD. Communication protocols that were used were UART, SPI, I2C, as well as Timer/Counter, PWM and ADC.

projects.name: Power Supply
projects.description: Designed and built a two channel power supply, designed a rectifier with a positive and a negative channel, providing 16 volts to a voltage regulator to output voltage from 2V-12V.

projects.name: Shell Program
projects.description: Programmed my own small shell program. Implemented features are: cd, status, exit, redirection, foreground and background processes, signals, as well as comands useing execvp.

projects.name: One-Time-Pads (OTP) Encryption Program
projects.description: Created five programs, two clients and two servers that encrypt and decrypt information using a onetimepad, and a key generator.

projects.name: Black Jack Game
projects.description: Programmed a Black Jack game in C++ using classes, the game designed to play against a dealer and allows for single and multiplayer.
